title: Shattered hand
text: Normal damage and 1d2 %ABILITY-CON=Con% and %ABILITY-STR=Str% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction%. Hand useless %UNTIL-HEALED=until healed%.

title: Rattled
text: Normal damage and target is %STATUS-CONFUSED=confused% for 1d3 rounds (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Con saving throw negates%).

title: Thunder strike
text: Double damage and target is %STATUS-DEAFENED=deafened% for 1d4 rounds.

title: Lights out
text: Normal damage and target is %STATUS-BLINDED=blinded% for 1d3 rounds.

title: Crushed trachea
text: Normal damage and target cannot breathe or speak. DC 13 Medicine check ends the condition.

title: Split open
text: Double damage and the target is %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 1 stage%.

title: Feeble parry
text: Double damage and target has 1 item disarmed.

title: Surprise opening
text: Double damage and one free attack against the target with %DISADVANTAGE=disadvantage%.

title: Back breaker
text: Double damage and 1d6 %ABILITY-DEX=Dex% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction%.

title: Terrible bruise
text: Double damage and 1d6 extra damage.

title: Broken leg
text: Normal damage and 1d4 %ABILITY-CON=Con% and %ABILITY-DEX=Dex% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction%. Target's speeds are reduced by half %UNTIL-HEALED=until healed%.

title: Spun around
text: Normal damage and target is %STATUS-RESTRAINED=restrained% for 1 round.

title: Where am I?
text: Normal damage and target is %STATUS-STUNNED=stunned% for 1 round.

title: To your thinky bits
text: Double damage and the target is %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 1 stage% (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Con saving throw negates%).

title: Crunch
text: Double damage and target is %STATUS-POISONED=poisoned% for 1 round (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Con saving throw negates%).

title: Armor dent
text: Double damage and 2d6 %OBJECT-DAMAGE=damage to metal armor%.

title: Breathless
text: Normal damage and target is %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 2 stages% for 1d4 rounds.

title: Mace to da' face
text: Normal damage and the target is %STATUS-INCAPACITATED=incapacitated% and %STATUS-BLINDED=blinded% for 1 round.

title: Tiring blow
text: Double damage plus target is %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 1 stage%.

title: Concussion
text: Normal damage and 1d2 %ABILITY-INT=Int% and %ABILITY-WIS=Wis% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction%.

title: Ruptured spleen
text: Normal damage and the target is %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 2 stages%.

title: Solid blow
text: Triple damage.

title: Crumpling blow
text: Double damage and target is knocked %STATUS-PRONE=prone%.

title: Collapsed lung
text: Normal damage and the target is %STATUS-INCAPACITATED=incapacitated% for 1d3 rounds (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Con saving throw negates% each round).

title: Flat foot
text: Double damage and 1 %ABILITY-DEX=Dex% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction% and target's speeds are reduced by 5 feet %UNTIL-HEALED=until healed%.

title: Skull crush
text: Double damage and 2d6 %ABILITY-INT=Int% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction% that only be healed with Greater Restoration (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Con saving throw halves%).

title: And stay down!
text: Normal damage and target is knocked %STATUS-PRONE=prone% and %STATUS-STUNNED=stunned% for 1 round (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Str saving throw negates% stun).

title: Bone masher
text: Normal damage and either 1d3 %ABILITY-DEX=Dex% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction% and halve speed (leg) or 1d3 %ABILITY-STR=Str% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction% (arm). Limb useless %UNTIL-HEALED=until healed%.

title: 2 for 1
text: Double damage to target and normal damage to one adjacent target.

title: Crushed intestines
text: Normal damage and the target %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 2 stages% (DC 15 Con saving throw negates).

title: Numbing blow
text: Normal damage and 1d4 %ABILITY-DEX=Dex% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction% and target is disarmed (1 item, %SAVE-CRITICAL=Dex saving throw negates% drop).

title: Roundhouse
text: Normal damage and a free attack against adjacent foes.

title: Staggering blow
text: Normal damage and the target is %STATUS-INCAPACITATED=incapacitated% for 1 round (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Con saving throw negates%).

title: My teef!
text: Normal damage and 1 %ABILITY-CON=Con% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction%. %UNTIL-HEALED=Until healed%, the Target loses bite attacks  attacks and the next time he casts a verbal spell rolls 1d20: 1-10: the spell is lost. 11-20 the spell is cast.

title: Earth rumble
text: Normal damage and a free trip attempt versus target and all adjacent enemies.

title: Pimp slap
text: Normal damage and target %STATUS-INCAPACITATED=incapacitated% for 1d2 rounds.

title: Cracked rib
text: Normal damage and 1d3 %ABILITY-CON=Con% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction% and target is %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 1 stage%.

title: Box the ears
text: Normal damage and target %STATUS-DEAFENED=deafened% for 1d4 hours.

title: Bell ringer
text: Normal damage and 1d2 %ABILITY-INT=Int% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction% and %STATUS-POISONED=poisoned% for 1d4 rounds.

title: Momentum
text: Double damage and %ADVANTAGE=advantage% on all your attack rolls for 1 round.

title: Broken nose
text: Normal damage and 1 %ABILITY-CHA=Cha% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction% and the target is %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 1 stage%.

title: Broken ribs
text: Double damage and target cannot heal naturally for 1d4 days.

title: Knockback
text: Double damage and target is pushed 1d6 × 5 feet directly away.

title: Low blow
text: Normal damage and target is %STATUS-POISONED=poisoned% for 1d6 rounds.

title: Brained
text: Double damage, the target can't take reactions and can only perform an action or a move in the next round.

title: Shield smack
text: Double damage and target's shield is disarmed.

title: I see stars
text: Normal damage and target takes has %DISADVANTAGE=disadvantage% on attacks for 1d4 rounds.

title: Nighty night
text: Normal damage and target is %STATUS-UNCONSCIOUS=unconscious% for 1d4 rounds (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Con saving throw negates%).

title: Cracked knee
text: Normal damage and 1d2 %ABILITY-DEX=Dex% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction%. Target's base land speed reduced to 10 feet %UNTIL-HEALED=until healed%.

title: What's going on?
text: Double damage and 1d4 hours of target's memory erased.

title: Crushed toe
text: Normal damage and 1d4 %ABILITY-DEX=Dex% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction%. Target's land speed is halved %UNTIL-HEALED=until healed%.

title: Off balance
text: Normal damage and target provokes opportunity attacks from all threatening opponents.
